summary: **Horizon Zero Dawn** is an action-packed game where you play as Aloy, a hunter in a world full of machines. Released in 2017 for PlayStation 4 and later for Windows, it's the first game in the Horizon series. You use bows, spears, and stealth to fight mechanical creatures and explore a vast open world. The game has an exciting story, beautiful visuals, and a unique post-apocalyptic setting. It was very popular and won many awards. A sequel, **Horizon Forbidden West**, came out in 2022.
title: Horizon Zero Dawn
